content: the holidays are the perfect time to give thoughtful personalized gifts and what better way to present a bottle of wine than with my beautifully handmade crochet wine bottle bag pattern **materials** ▢caron one pound yarn - claret ▢caron one pound yarn - white ▢4 5 mm hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring - magic_ring chains - chain single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet back loop only - blo slip_stitch - slip_stitch increases increase
